overview.en: Launched on 31 Jan 2019 by an anonymous team of developers, Bitgrin describes itself as a decentralized, open-source, and privacy-centric cryptocurrency that is built on Mimblewimble. Transactions are private by default. Bitgrin is forked from Grin and has capped its maximum supply at 21,000,000 XBG.
overview.zh: XBG是Grin的分叉币，具有匿名性、安全性、拓展性，Bitgrin基于MimbleWimble隐私协议，并结合了比特币分配参数，每4年奖励减少一半。
